short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace monotonous internet content with pictures of your co-workers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you fed up of being continuously inundated with saucy images of Kim K, duck pout selfies and facebook albums full of your work colleague's children?

Well not to worry, there is a solution. Say hello, to Beta Blocker.

Using the latest technology (patent pending, copyright, trademarked) you can now remove all trace of imagery on the internet and replace it with pictures of your co-workers at Forever Beta.

Do you work at Forever Beta? I'm after a creative internship! Put in a good work for me yeah? You can find me on linkedin here:

https://uk.linkedin.com/in/serbski
